publication.title: Primer Design and Marker Clustering for Multiplex SNP-IT Primer Extension Genotyping Assay using Statistical Modeling
publication.authors: anton yuryev,jianping huang,kathryn e. scott,jennifer kuebler,miriam donaldson,mark pohl,michael t. boyce-jacino
publication.keyword: Cluster Algorithm;Failure Probability;Failure Rate;Primer Design;Statistical Model;Success Rate;High Throughput;
publication.abstract: Motivation: The optimization of the primer design is critical for the development of high-throughput SNP genotyping methods. Recently developed statistical models of the SNP-IT primer extension genotyping reaction allow further improvement of primer quality for the assay.
